## My Job Description

Using STATA, I assist PhD students in analyzing microdata from the Indonesian Family Life Survey (IFLS) to assess the impact of climate change on farmer household income and labor mobility in Indonesia. This involves cleaning and preparing data, running statistical analyses, and interpreting results.
